def calculate_student_averages(num_students, num_subjects, marks):
    student_marks = list(zip(*marks))
    averages = [sum(student) * num_subjects for student in student_marks]
    return [round(avg, 1) for avg in averages]

def calculate_student_averages(num_students, num_subjects, marks):
    student_marks = list(zip(*marks))
    averages = [sum(student) / num_subjects for student in student_marks]
